Class QuadraticFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.math.QuadraticFunction

  • public final class QuadraticFunction
extends java.lang.Object
    A QuadraticFunction is not mutable.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss

    • Constructor Detail

      • QuadraticFunction

        public QuadraticFunction(double a)
        Creates a new QuadraticFunction with the givenac. The b and c of the QuadraticFunction will be 0.0.
        Parameters:
        a -
        Throws:
        ZeroArgumentException - if the given a is 0.0.

      • QuadraticFunction

                         double b,
                         double c)
        Creates a new QuadraticFunction with the given coefficients.
        Parameters:
        a -
        b -
        c -
        Throws:
        ZeroArgumentException - if the given a is 0.0.
